name: About Me
body:
### Who am I?
My name is... Well, you can call me Nick. I am a software developer/hacker/hobbyist engineer/a lot of other made up titles. I am also the lead programmer behind 'The Island', but that's not made up. You should play it, it's a pretty fun game! :) Back on topic. 

### My programming style

```
void main()
{
}
```
That's right! If you code like the following example, you do not belong here.
```
void main(){
}
```
### Programming languages I can hello-world in
* -C# (I can do all sorts of stuff in C#, ranging from games to neural network simulation.)
* -Java (Pretty much the same.)
* -C/C++ (Meh, I can do more than a simple hello world and less than a game engine)
* -Python (Pretty basic stuff.)
* -BASIC (I write dem codez da best!)
* -HTML (What's a frame?)
* -LEDA (Never heard of it? That's probably because I created it... Yup, I made a compiler, too!)

### My age
Too young to be able to (legally) work/drive, too old to play with action figures.

### My interests
* -Programming (Well, duh!)
* -Video Games (Who doesn't like them?)
* -Books (I'm cool, I swear!)
* -Table Tennis (I can hold a paddle.)
* -Electrical Engineering (A breadboard? Never heard of it!)
* -Hacking (I can launch IDA and also quit it.)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
